turret.foundational¶

class turret.foundational.DataType¶

Bases: object

The type of weights and tensors.

FLOAT¶

FP32 format.

Type

turret.DataType

HALF¶

FP16 format.

Type

turret.DataType

INT8¶

INT8 format.

Type

turret.DataType

INT32¶

INT32 format.

Type

turret.DataType

FLOAT = <DataType.FLOAT: 0>
HALF = <DataType.HALF: 1>
INT32 = <DataType.INT32: 3>
INT8 = <DataType.INT8: 2>
nptype¶

NumPy data-type for this type.

size¶

Number of bytes consumed by an element of this type.

class turret.foundational.DimensionType¶

Bases: object

The type of data encoded across this dimension.

CHANNEL = <DimensionType.CHANNEL: 1>¶
INDEX = <DimensionType.INDEX: 2>¶

SPATIAL = <DimensionType.SPATIAL: 0>¶
class turret.foundational.Dimensions¶

Bases: object

Structure to define the dimensions of a tensor.

static CHW()¶

Make descriptor for 2D spatial data with channels.

static HW()¶

Make descriptor for 2D spatial data.

static NCHW()¶

Make descriptor for 2D spatial data with channels and indices.

shape¶

Tuple of dimensions.

size¶

Number of elements.

class turret.foundational.Weights¶

Bases: object

An array of weights used as a layer parameter.

Parameters

  • values (numpy.ndarray) – The weight values.

  • dtype (data-type) – The type of the weights. values.dtype will be used as it when dtype is None.
